titleStmt.title: By the Lords-Justices and council, a proclamation. Charles Porter, Tho: Coningesby. Whereas many and great inconveniencies do arise from the irregular granting of protections, ...
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lords Justices and Council.
Coningsby, Thomas Coningsby, Earl, 1656?-1729.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andrew Crook assignee of Benjamin Tooke printer to the King and Queen at their Majesties printing-house on Ormonde-Key,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening words of text.
"Given at the Council-Chamber, the 24th day of February, 1690.".
Voiding protections not granted by the General Commander.--Steele.
Steele notation: Arms 199. arise thers 2) them, Protection.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
